Letters from former slaves of Terrell settled in Liberia, 1857-1866
February 17, 1859 from Henry Franklin to Dr. James H. Minor
Careysburg Feb 17 th 1859 Dr. Jm. Miner Dear Sir

Theas Lines me in good health at preasant I wish you would pleas to let me know if their is any thing commig to me & if their is pleas send me Sume Cloth I am Learning Lumber & Farming Sume Rember me to all the Freinds
Henry Franklin to Dr. James H. Minor 1858 February 17
Henry Franklin to Dr. James H. Minor 1858 February 17
